name: dLocal Go payments for WooCommerce
author: dLocal Go

sections.description:
This plugin adds dLocal Go Payment Gateway for WooCommerce to allow customers access to multiple local payment methods in LATAM.

** We support: **
* Credit and Debit cards
* Online bank transfers (EFT)
* Cash methods

Translations

  • English
  • Portuguese
  • Spanish
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.4 or greater

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “dLocal Go payments for WooCommerce” and click Search Plugins. Once you have found our plugin you can view details about it such as the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0 – 2022-11-10

  • Initial plugin release

1.0.1 – 2022-12-16

  • Bugfixes and clearer error messages

1.0.2 – 2023-01-17

  • Modified dlocalgo endpoint beacuse of DNS changes

1.0.3 – 2023-01-24

  • Reverted DNS changes after fix

1.0.4 – 2023-03-14

  • Fix on auto-complete orders

1.0.5 – 2023-05-08

  • Fix of empty country code and fix when cancelling orders in pending payment status.

1.0.6 – 2023-07-31

  • Testing for latest WordPress version and refund fix
